name: Rabbit Story
storyline: Rabbit forgets about his friend Kitty’s birthday. One would think this could happen to anyone, right? But Kitty gets upset and leaves. Rabbit is devastated; to take his mind off this, he sets out on a journey and meets Doggy. Now when Rabbit has a new friend, suddenly Kitty comes back - and along comes the guilt. Despite its simplicity, Rabbit Story is a tale of complicated human relationships.
summary: Rabbit Story is a top-down adventure game with simple mouse controls. While focusing on the story and the dialogues, the game offers to explore its levels and play mini-games.
